plot: House tries radical procedures to save Foreman's life; Foreman's father visits.

Foreman's state worsens, blind although he didn't even notice it. Cuddy refuses permission to use the infected cop's body, so House can only use pet rat Steve as a lab animal. He orders combined treatment for all kinds of agents. It works, but the drugs soon overload his system. Foreman's medical proxy goes to Cameron rather than Rodney who would blindly follow House.—KGF Vissers

The entire team, including the new patient, blasts Cuddy for refusing to flout the CDC protocol when the police officer dies. In a desperate move, House infects his pet rat, Steve McQueen, with the illness so he can autopsy and try to diagnose. House gives the new patient Legionnaire's to try to buy some time. Foreman's father visits PPH. Cameron receives an unexpected vote of confidence in the form of power of attorney. She butts heads with House and lives to regret it.—LA-Lawyer
